question.title: Strings Differ by One Character
question.similarQuestions: [{"title": "Count Words Obtained After Adding a Letter", "titleSlug": "count-words-obtained-after-adding-a-letter", "difficulty": "Medium", "translatedTitle": null}]
hints: BruteForce, check all pairs and verify if they differ in one character. O(n^2 * m) where n is the number of words and m is the length of each string.
O(m^2 * n), Use hashset, to insert all possible combinations adding a character "*". For example: If dict[i] = "abc", insert ("*bc", "a*c" and "ab*").
